landing.badge: End-to-End Encrypted · Open Source · Zero Trust
landing.headline: Share files with
landing.subtext: VaultShare encrypts your files before they leave your device. No plaintext ever touches our servers, only ciphertext. Built for journalists, developers, and anyone who values true privacy.
landing.ctaNote: Free to start · No credit card required · AES-256 encryption
landing.feat1Desc: Files are encrypted client-side before upload. Only you and your recipients can decrypt them, not even our servers.
landing.feat2Desc: Generate password-protected, expiring share links. No account required for recipients.
landing.feat3Desc: Set files to self-destruct after download or after a time limit. Leave no digital trace.
